THE NEGRO SPIRITUAL - KPFA

TEE HOUR GAIJ - U. of Chicago
— NO - This may be good literature, but I don’t think the pro

THE FOUR AGES OF JAPAN - U. of Chicago
— NO - We should probably make an effort to know more about the
Japanese culture, and a noted authority from Japan would certainly
see® like a fine source of authentic information. However, the

terested would bear with it to the end of the program, and even

THE EGOIST IN TRAGEDY - 0. of Chicago
— YES - An interesting and educational subject, handled in a most
